CMMySQLQuery.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 include_once("CMQueryProtocol.php");
00004 
00014 class CMMySQLQuery implements CMQueryProtocol {
00015  
00021  public static function Version() {
00022   return "1.0";
00023  }
00024  
00030  public static function Since() {
00031   return "1.0";
00032  }
00033  
00039  private $affectedRows = 0;
00040  
00044  private $result = false;
00045  
00051  private $driver = 'mysqli';
00052  
00056  private $a = array();
00057  
00066  public function CMMySQLQuery($r, $affected = 0, $driver = 'mysqli', $a = array()) {
00067   $this->result = $r;
00068   $this->affectedRows = $affected;
00069   $this->driver = $driver;
00070   $this->a = $a;
00071  }
00072  
00105  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00106   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00107    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00108    
00109   if(!$this->result)
00110    return false;
00111    
00112   if($this->driver == 'mysqli') {
00113    
00114    if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00115     $r = $this->result->fetch_assoc();
00116    elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00117     $r = $this->result->fetch_row();
00118    elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00119     $r = $this->result->fetch_row();
00120     if(!$r) return false;
00121     $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00122    } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00123     $r = $this->result->fetch_row();
00124     if(!$r) return false;
00125     $r = $r[0];
00126    } else $r = false;
00127    
00128   } else {
00129   
00130    if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00131     $r = mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00132    elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00133     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result);
00134    elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00135     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result);
00136     if(!$r) return false;
00137     $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00138    } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00139     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result);
00140     if(!$r) return false;
00141     $r = $r[0];
00142    } else $r = false;
00143    
00144   }
00145   
00146   // apply formatter
00147   if($formatter !== false)
00148    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00149   
00150   return $r;
00151  }
00152  
00177  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00178   if(!$this->result)
00179    return false;
00180   $r = array();
00181   
00182   if($direction == 'single')
00183    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00184   
00185   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00186    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00187     $r[] = $row;
00188    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00189     if(is_array($row)) {
00190      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00191       $r[] = $v;
00192     } else $r[] = $row;
00193    } else return false;
00194   }
00195   
00196   return $r;
00197  }
00198  
00209  public function availableMethods() {
00210   return array('fetch', 'fetchAll', 'affectedRows', 'totalRows');
00211  }
00212  
00216  public function affectedRows() {
00217   return $this->affectedRows;
00218  }
00219  
00227  public function totalRows() {
00228   if($this->driver == 'mysqli')
00229    return $this->result->num_rows;
00230   return mysql_num_rows($this->result);
00231  }
00232  
00236  public function success() {
00237   return $this->result !== false;
00238  }
00239  
00243  public function __toString() {
00244   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00245  }
00246  
00247 }
